### Objective
- Evaluate patterns models of ice coverage globally with climate change

### Load packages
```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(raster)
library(ncdf4)
library(tidyverse)

```


### Read in files
```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
allfiles <- list.files("data//isimip_ice", full.names = T)

## Take a look at a raster
viewSample <- stack(allfiles[1])
plot(viewSample[[100]])

```
